This blog post have puzzled me for months, probably have made a different version of some type of it in the past..

My appreciation for culture, science, people, history and art is unprecedented. Dr. Jordan Peterson coined a this as a curse, the curse of creativity. He explains that it is one of the worst talents that you can have. It is very difficult to create an identity for yourself as your constant fascination constantly drag you to different directions. Another thing is creativity is very very difficult to monetize and make as a career..

His explanation was my a narrative that played for the past two years. I sure did enjoy becoming:

  • a vlogger,
  • a blogger,
  • a marketing and business development head,
  • a drone operator,
  • construction supervisor,
  • video editor,
  • accountant
  • tour guide / historian
  • camp volunteer

but in the eyes of many they couldn’t understand what I was doing. A
